oliviaway.title: ambition
oliviaway.about:
Oliviaway, from Cambridge, England, started sharing sounds with the world earlier this year. Her latest offering is ambition, four tracks of lush ambient that’s tranquil and light in texture. “Oceanoftenderness” practically floats, guiding the listener through a five-minute meditation. The music on ambition moves slowly, perfect for stationary listening and for clearing one’s mind. Celestial, warm tones make “your thoughts melted away” one of the standouts.
-Aurora Mitchell

oliviaway.title: ELDERBERRY
oliviaway.about:
- One day the clouds will rise above us, it will rain
- But we're not going to lose hope
oliviaway.credits:
released February 15, 2020
The sounds of this album were recorded on a recorder from the forest environment.
I also used an old upset piano and a handpan.
Everything was processed and finished with the equipment bought from your donations, I've always dreamed of it, thank you! <3

oliviaway.title: FRAGMENTS
oliviaway.about:
I was having tea on my veranda the other night and saw lightning bolts.
Heard a massive thunderstorm impulse, which inspired me to write this album.
The compositions sound as if you're in the middle of a melancholic yet beautiful natural phenomenon.

oliviaway.title: It's A Feeling
oliviaway.about:
Dear listeners!
This is a 200th album and I am very happy that you are listening to my music!
When I started writing the ambient, I could not even imagine that so many people would be with me!
I want to thank you very much for your support and kind words, you make the little girl happy.
Thank you <3

oliviaway.title: Nostalgia in the Wind
oliviaway.about:
I am incredibly grateful to each and every one of you for your support, for listening to my music and allowing it to be a part of your life. Your support is the fuel for my creativity, and it means more to me than words can express.
Today is a special day – it's my birthday! And I want to celebrate it with you all by sharing the fruit of my inspiration – my new album.
This album is a journey I took to express the beauty of the spring forest, the silence of the city at night. I hope that the album not only gives you moments of peace and inspiration, but also becomes your own soundtrack for exploring the world around you and within yourself.
Thank you for being with me! Your support is the best gift I could receive.
With love and gratitude,
Oliviaway

You feel alone, but you're not.
You have life, natural scenery and sound.
You have unity with nature, we come from nature.
You're beautiful creatures, don't forget it.
